moves.1. Nc3: a very slow opening in my book
moves.1... e5: if white does not want the center i will take it.
moves.2... Nf6 3. h3: my knight was not going to g4, but you do not have time for this.
moves.5... Qe7 6. d4: finally a fight for the center, but so many pawn moves, they do not go back.
moves.6... e4 7. f4: closed center, is fine with me i am way ahead in developement
moves.7... Nc6 8. g4 h6 9. f5: i wanted to have a back door for the knight
moves.9... h5: trying to break the rook out
moves.10. g5 Ng8 11. Nxd5 Qd6 12. c4: damn these pawns are actually becoming a burden
moves.12... Bxf5 13. Qa4 Rc8 14. Nc3: i see the check but want to secure things first
moves.19. Rg1 Be7: attacking the pawn and making room if i need to casle
moves.21. Bxe4 Bxh3 22. Kc2 Bxg5 23. d5 Bd7 24: goot run for my life here this is looking very bad
moves.25. Nd5: *please note i see the discoverd check but i know it is futuile at this point, the queen only takes my knight and i gain nothing*
moves.26. Rae1 Nd4+: i have no choice but to this check now.
moves.27. Qxd4 Qf2 28. Rxg5 Be6 29. Ne7+ Kh8: knight takes knight leads to mate
moves.30. Bxg6 cxd6 31. Nxc8 Rxc8: now i am way behind but i still have my queen.
moves.33... Kg8 34. Bh7+: well he gets a free discoverd.
moves.34... Kh8 35. Bd3+: i am so glad my queen is on black
moves.35... Kg8 36. Bxb5: he got a pwn for his discovery. whew
moves.36... g6: push the rook out i hope
moves.37. Rh6 Qf5+ 38. e4 Rxc5+: i am gonna go for broke
moves.39. Kd1 Qg4+ 40. Be2 Bb3#: i got lucky and fell into a pile of shit, i came out with a leather coat.
